ResearchProjectDef.label: basic artisanal goods
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks a range of specialized artisanal processes, enabling colonists to craft unique products using traditional methods and tools.

ResearchProjectDef.label: complex artisanal goods
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks a range of more complex artisanal processes. Enabling the creation of more complex and unique products.
